title: OpenSea shifts focus from BSC to Layer-2 solutions amid rapid NFT innovation
description: OpenSea, the leading Web3 marketplace for NFTs, has discontinued support for Binance Smart Chain (BSC), a major layer-1 blockchain. The company announced on August 18, a year after initially integrating BSC. In a Twitter post, OpenSea explained that the move was driven by a desire to focus on its most promising initiatives. title: Shiba Inu devs unveil Shibarium scaling plans amid technical challenges

title: Is Everlodge Token Better Than Tezos (XTZ) And Algorand (ALGO)?
